video_description:
Mike Sheaff of Sheaff Vehicles & Tauranga Ssangyong reviews the ultimate family tow vehicle.
With 3.2 tonn of tow, the 7 seater Rexton offers something for everyone in the family.  Luxury motoring at a budget price.


For more info view at www.sheaff.co.nz

Filmed as part of Central TV Motor Expo program (NZ Freeview channel 30)
title: Ssangyong Rexton Review, Sheaff Vehicles

comments.text: Isn't there a 290 diesel as well? I hear the﻿ engine is based off the MB engine of 1996 vintage, obviously with modern electronics. Probably why it is unbreakable.
comments.author: EnigmaNZ1
